title: Will Allah my turn bad deeds into good deeds if I repent similarly to the one who reverts to Islam
transcript:

is so we know that people who are reverts and   converts to Islam from other religions once they 
like accept Islam all their past sins are forgiven   and whatever sins that they may have committed
